name: Muhammed Salih T A
tagline: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world. â€” Albert Einstein
body:
# Muhammed Salih T A

### Portfolio
Creating and enhancing anything technology related is my profession . When it comes to logics its become my passion , my ultimate goal is to make the world a better place. I'm a developer on the bleeding edge of technology. 

### On the Web 

The computer languages I use are C#,python, Java, HTML, CSS, XML, JSON, JavaScript, PHP 5, MongoDB and MySQL . The technologies and libraries I utilize are Microsoft IIS, Microsoft ASP.NET Apache, PHP (MVC Framework: CakePhp and CodeIgniter), AJAX, jQuery, The tools I work with are Git with GitHub,SVN, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio, Eclipse, Firebug and netbeans 

### On the Desktop and Mobile

I developed for Windows mac and Linux desktops and for Android and iphones The computer languages I use are C, C++, Objective-C ,Java,SQLite. The tools I work with are Git with GitHub, TortoiseSVN (Subversion), Borland Turbo C++ 3, Microsoft Visual Studio, Eclipse, Apple Xcode,Titanium. 

### Specialities 
I have extensive experience in many related fields, but the work I am most passionate about are developing smartphone applications and web applications. 

### 
From work experience, I practice training developers, enforcing standard practices, supervising, developing applications, software engineering, graphic designing, and user interface engineering. During my spare time, I enjoy doing technology research and experiments, prototyping applications for the future. .
